Stedak wrote:

> How would I test for two users editing the same record for an
> application server (JBoss)? As a second thought is there a standard
> way of handling or preventing this?

I assume you mean two users using the same web application and 
performing the same operation (changing an object).

In that case, use HTMLUnit, create two separate WebClient objects and 
use them however you need: simulate user A first and user B second; 
simulate B then A; simulate the two at roughly the same time using 
multiple threads.

I hope this helps.
